alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 3:17AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Taylor County through 430 AM EST... At 317 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Perry to 48 miles southeast of Carrabelle. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Pinland, Fish Creek, Jug Island, Howell Place, Secotan, Carbur, Cabbage Grove, Adams Beach, Scanlon, Econfina, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Keaton Beach, Bird Island, Foley, Blue Springs, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction and Athena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
